page.title: 11GAMES:OUR OWN
page.content: {LADDERS In ladders you have to get in a line with a partner.Somebody numbers you and if your number is called out you have to jump up,run down the middle, run up the side,jump over the rest of the legs and get back to your place before your partner gets back. One game which has always been played at our school is DUMP.All the players sit in a circle,facing into the middle.One player walks round the outside of the circle.He or she has to drop a handkerchief behind one of the people sitting.That person then has to chase the first one ,trying to catch him before he sits down in the empty place.If the first person manages to reach the plce first,then the second person is 'On'and it is his turn to walk round.
